column5: TTPH first time seen in bio for a while dont know about rest of you but my portfolio is up big and market indices are down huge really hope this is a sector rotation into biotech IBB and XBI It is more than warranted given the China and Mexico impact to markets IMO Drug developers should not be impacted
TTPH look at overall markets then look at XBI and IBB

TTPH cnbc talking heads just said if theres one sector to invest in now its healthcarebiotech Joe Biden is showing that moderate thought is prevailing over radical socialism medicare for all and the fear of all that on healthcare is overplayed time to invest in this sector I agree for once with talking heads it is time IMO

TTPH lets get this over a buck and head to 150
